transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji, SK Guru se baat kar rahe hain sir?
Customer: Ji sir, bataiye.
Executive: Sir, Vijay Agrawal bol raha hun IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan, Vijay sir, bataiye.
Executive: Bas badhiya, badhiya. Main keh raha hun ji, baithe ho kya sir? Online baithe ho, bheju video meeting ka link aapko main?
Customer: Ji?
Executive: Apna parso baat kar baat hua tha na apna sir, wo keh rahe the karne ke liye sir.
Customer: Haan, haan.
Executive: To main keh raha tha ki aap aise hi ek baar online main jo aap keh rahe the ki Nitish ne to bata diya tha ki maine bol diya tha main khud connect kar lunga aapko cheeze sahi karne ke liye, to aap ek baar aaiye online main kar deta hun sir cheez sahi aapka.
Customer: Actually hum aap Siddhant sa hum apne bahan ka ghar mein ja rahe hain, haan? Karib 60 kilometer door, hello?
Executive: To aapko hum.
Customer: Haan, abhi hamara chhote bhai ka ghar number hai na aapke paas?
Executive: Sir, lekin jo baat karni hai na wo aap hi se ho payegi na meri to.
Customer: Nahi nahi, wo bhi mast malang aadmi hai. Hain?
Executive: Wo bhi mast malang aadmi hai. Aise karte karte hum baithe maan ke chaliye aapko time nahi de paya to aise hi karte karte mahina chala jayega. To aap soche ek chhote se ek baar connect kar lijiye na please.
Customer: Second number pe?
Executive: Haan haan, 7896.
Executive: Aaj jo second number hai aapka us pe keh raha hun na connect karne ke liye?
Customer: Ah, nahi uska number bata raha hai hum.
Executive: Ji bataiye number.
Customer: 7896.
Executive: Fir se boliye.
Customer: 7896
Executive: 789
Customer: 7896
Executive: 78
Customer: 53
Customer: 9343
Executive: 9343?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: 7896539343.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai, main baat kar leta hun unse.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive wants to connect to fix issues.

- Customer is travelling to his sister's house.

- Customer wants to give his brother's number.



Resolution:

- Executive took the brother's number.

- Executive agreed to call the customer's brother.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- connection, online, number, follow-up
